import React from 'react'; const Refund = () => { return (

Refund Policy

1. Cancellation and Refund Eligibility

Refunds are available for cancelled bookings according to our cancellation policy. The amount and timing of refunds depend on when the cancellation is made relative to the scheduled pickup time.

2. Cancellation Timeframes

Free Cancellation: Cancellations made 24 hours or more before the scheduled pickup time are eligible for a full refund.

Partial Refund: Cancellations made between 2-24 hours before pickup are eligible for a 50% refund of the total rental amount.

No Refund: Cancellations made less than 2 hours before pickup or no-shows are not eligible for refunds.

3. Refund Processing

Refunds are processed within 5-10 business days after cancellation approval. The refund will be credited back to the original payment method used for the booking.

4. Early Returns

If you return a vehicle earlier than the scheduled return date, you may be eligible for a partial refund for the unused rental days. Early return refunds are calculated on a pro-rata basis.

5. Vehicle Unavailability

If we are unable to provide the booked vehicle due to mechanical issues, accidents, or other operational reasons, you will receive a full refund or the option to choose an alternative vehicle at no additional cost.

6. Weather and Force Majeure

In cases of severe weather conditions, natural disasters, or other force majeure events that prevent safe vehicle operation, we will provide full refunds or reschedule bookings at no additional charge.

7. Service Quality Issues

If you experience significant service quality issues that are not resolved during your rental period, you may be eligible for a partial or full refund. All service issues must be reported immediately to our customer service team.

8. Refund Exclusions

Refunds are not provided for:

  • Late returns beyond the grace period
  • Additional charges for fuel, cleaning, or damage
  • Insurance premiums and add-on services
  • Administrative fees and processing charges
  • Bookings made through third-party platforms (subject to their policies)

9. Refund Request Process

To request a refund, contact our customer service team within 30 days of the rental period. Provide your booking reference number and detailed reason for the refund request.

10. Documentation Requirements

Refund requests may require supporting documentation such as receipts, photos, or incident reports. We reserve the right to investigate claims before processing refunds.

11. Dispute Resolution

If you disagree with a refund decision, you may escalate the matter to our customer relations team. We will review your case and provide a final decision within 10 business days.

12. Refund Methods

Refunds are processed using the same payment method used for the original booking. Credit card refunds may take 5-10 business days to appear on your statement, while bank transfers may take 3-5 business days.

13. Currency and Exchange Rates

Refunds are processed in the same currency as the original payment. If currency conversion is involved, the refund amount will be based on the exchange rate at the time of processing.

14. Special Promotions and Discounts

Refunds for bookings made with promotional codes or special discounts are calculated based on the actual amount paid, not the original advertised price.

15. Corporate and Fleet Rentals

Corporate and fleet rental refunds are subject to separate terms outlined in corporate agreements. Please refer to your corporate account manager for specific refund policies.

16. Contact Information

For refund inquiries and requests, please contact our customer service team:

Phone: +91 98765 43210
Email: refunds@chalyati.com
Hours: Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM IST

Last updated: December 2024

); }; export default Refund;
